title: Lima Highlights: Historic Center, Love Park & Pisco ‚Äì Join Us
description: Explore Lima, Peru‚Äîincluding Parque del Amor, the Huaca Pucllana archaeological site, the Historic Center (a UNESCO World Heritage Site)‚Äîwith ease on a half-day tour alongside a bilingual guide and forget about the language barrier. With just 15 people on your small-group tour, you'll enjoy an intimate experience, plus a pisco sour and ceviche demonstration and tasting.
all_descriptions: Explore Lima, Peru‚Äîincluding Parque del Amor, the Huaca Pucllana archaeological site, the Historic Center (a UNESCO World Heritage Site)‚Äîwith ease on a half-day tour alongside a bilingual guide and forget about the language barrier. With just 15 people on your small-group tour, you'll enjoy an intimate experience, plus a pisco sour and ceviche demonstration and tasting.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:El Parque del Amor, Malecon Cisneros 18, Lima PeruWe start our tour by picking up each traveler from their Hotel or Airbnb.

First, you will visit one of the 50 most romantic parks in the world, located in the Miraflores neighborhood, known as the Parque del Amor, this park is a small and colorful refuge for couples in love. From here you have a magnificent view of the sea. It is inspired by Park G√ºell in Barcelona and has in the central part a sculpture called "El Beso" by the Peruvian sculptor V√≠ctor Delf√≠n.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Huaca Pucllana, Calle General Borgono s/n, cuadra 8, Lima 15074 PeruContinuing with our tour, you will visit the Huaca Pucllana Archaeological Site in a panoramic way, a sacred site belonging to the Lima culture.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Plaza de Armas (Plaza Mayor), Jr. Junin and Jr. Carabaya, Lima PeruThen we will visit the historic center of Lima and walk through its main squares, streets, churches and shreds of the ancient city of the Kings.

Likewise, we will walk through the main square of Lima where our experienced guide will narrate the historical background of the old viceroyalty of Peru, we will appreciate the architectural monuments that surround the square, such as the cathedral of Lima, archiepiscopal palace, government palace.

As soon as we finish our walk through the historic center, you will visit the chocomuseum, a museum store where it shows us the history of chocolate and cocoa in Peru, we can also taste its typical liquors and jams made from chocolate and cocoa.Duration: 1 hourStop At:Casa de la Literatura Peruana, Jr. Ancash 207 Centro Hist√≥rico de Lima, Lima PeruContinuing our walk we will observe the old abandoned station today converted into the house of Peruvian Literature, we will also be able to appreciate artisan shops and we will give you time so you can buy Peruvian crafts, after that you will visit an old colonial house today converted into a small traditional bar and In this place we will learn how to prepare the flagship drink of Peru ‚ÄúEl pisco Sour‚Äù.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Museo Convento San Francisco y Catacumbas, Jiron Ancash, Lima 15001 PeruFinally we will enter the Convent, Museum of San Francisco and its catacombs, here we will have a guided tour for 30 minutes and we will visit some of the oldest cemeteries in the city located below the San Francisco convent, finally we will proceed to take you to your hotel and in If you want to stay for lunch or dinner in the center, the return is on your own account.Duration: 40 minutes

Love Park, Mal. Cisneros, Miraflores LIMA 18, PeruClients who choose the meeting point option for this tour will be picked up at Parque del Amor in Miraflores. One day before the tour, our team will contact you to confirm the exact pick-up time and share the details of your assigned guide, ensuring a smooth and well-organized experience.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

reviews.title: Lovely tour of lima and the historic centre
reviews.text: Our tour guide Patrick was so lovely and informative ! He knew so much about everywhere we went. An amazing way to explore Lima and learn about the history! The pisco tasting was a fun part of the tour. Thank you :)

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text: We participated in the morning tour of the historic center of Lima. Great experience concluded with a Pisco tasting. Our guide Gema was very knowledgeable and nice. I highly recommend!

reviews.title: Great experience with Lima highlights tour
reviews.text: I booked the tour very short term to shorten the 12 hour stopover in Lima. I chose airport pickup (they pick you up at intl arrivals). I lucked out and was the only one on the tour. My tour guide was Melanie and she did a marvelous job. She speaks English fluently and was easy to talk to. She really put her heart into explaining everything about the places we visited. As far as I can tell this tour shows you the highlights of Lima and I would certainly recommend it wholeheartedly.

reviews.title: I really liked the tour city we followed the itinerary correctly and visited all points, recommend for chairs! Gr
reviews.text: Very good experience, helped my friend chairman all the way, many stories about Lima, very worth this experience

reviews.title: Excellent experience.
reviews.text: Very complete tour. We visited from the seawall through the Miraflores and Barranco neighborhoods to the beautiful Plaza de Armas.  Stopping by the San Francisco Convent.

reviews.title: Knowing the center and history of Lima
reviews.text: We went with Bryan to take a tour of downtown Lima while explaining historical facts and curious facts about Lima and Peru. Very interesting and educational!Finally we have done a small tasting of different piscos, all of them delicious!

reviews.title: Very good time to spend on a layover in Lima
reviews.text: Proper pickup experience, and the commentaries by Patrick, starting at the arheological site, continued at the cathedral, catacomb and the main square were well on the spot! The drink tasting, even more the Miraflores views were great to experience! ... I can recommend this tour and Guide for anyone who is on a 6-8 hours layover and cannot go deeper because of that. It was much better than sitting at the airport. :)

reviews.title: Interesting tour of the center
reviews.text: Good experience with Patrick. The church part and interesting catacombs. The rest of the tour enjoyable with varied explanations.

reviews.title: Amazing experience ü§© and complete

reviews.text: Excellent guide, Bryan very knowledgeable, we were going slowly, really enjoying and understanding the tour, time to buy, try, take photos, etc.
